title: Designing a Curriculum Mapping and Unit Guidance System for Corporate Training at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Basic Curriculum Design and Management, and LMS Usage
context.additional_context: Smartphone-Based Learning Environments Emphasizing Practical Application Through Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze acceptance factors of curriculum mapping systems based on the TAM model
Learners can explain the curriculum design process step-by-step using a unit guide system
Learners can establish and apply UGIS (Unit Guide Information System) utilization strategies in mobile environments
Learners can propose methods for applying mapping systems to actual corporate curricula through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
